name: part_007
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Hametsu no Junjou'.

subtitles.original: ...かわせて おためしで
subtitles.english: ...try exchanging them

subtitles.original: ゼロとボロの 分類さえできない 街を
subtitles.english: In a city where you can't even tell the difference between zero and junk

subtitles.original: 抜け出したって 互いに笑い合う
subtitles.english: Even if we escape, we'll laugh together

subtitles.original: メロウなエンディング
subtitles.english: A mellow ending

subtitles.original: それは鼓動 切なさを鳴らすもの
subtitles.english: That's a heartbeat, something that rings out sadness

subtitles.original: 追いかけた途端に 見失っちゃうの
subtitles.english: The moment I chase it, I lose sight of it

subtitles.original: きっと永遠が どっかにあるんだと
subtitles.english: Surely eternity is out there somewhere

subtitles.original: 明後日を 探し回るのも 悪くはないでしょう
subtitles.english: Searching for the day after tomorrow isn't so bad, right?

subtitles.original: 思い出が どっかに消えた朝より
subtitles.english: Rather than a morning where memories have vanished somewhere

subtitles.original: こんな夜の方が まだマシさ
subtitles.english: A night like this is much better

subtitles.original: 肺に睡蓮 遠くのサイレン
subtitles.english: Water lilies in my lungs, a distant siren

subtitles.original: 響き合う境界線
subtitles.english: Resonating boundaries

subtitles.original: 愛し合う様に 喧嘩しようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's fight as if we love each other

subtitles.original: 遣る瀬無さ 引っ下げて
subtitles.english: Carrying this helplessness with us

subtitles.original: 肺に睡蓮 遠くのサイレン
subtitles.english: Water lilies in my lungs, a distant siren

subtitles.original: 響き合う境界線
subtitles.english: Resonating boundaries

subtitles.original: 愛し合う様に 喧嘩しようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's fight as if we love each other

subtitles.original: 遣る瀬無さ 引っ下げて
subtitles.english: Carrying this helplessness with us

subtitles.original: たった一瞬の この煌めきを
subtitles.english: This radiance of just a single moment

subtitles.original: 食べ尽くそう 二人でくたばるまで
subtitles.english: Let's devour it until we both drop dead

subtitles.original: そして鼓動 僕らにノリを
subtitles.english: And may the heartbeat give us a rhythm

subtitles.original: まだ行こう 誰も追いつけないくらいのスピードで
subtitles.english: Let's keep going, at a speed no one can catch up to

subtitles.original: それは鼓動 切なさを鳴らすもの
subtitles.english: That's a heartbeat, something that rings out sadness

subtitles.original: 追いかけた途端に 見失っちゃうの
subtitles.english: The moment I chase it, I lose sight of it

subtitles.original: きっと永遠が どっかにあるんだと
subtitles.english: Surely eternity is out there somewhere

subtitles.original: 明後日を 探し回るのも 悪くはないでしょう
subtitles.english: Searching for the day after tomorrow isn't so bad, right?

subtitles.original: 稲妻の様に 生きてたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to live like a bolt of lightning

subtitles.original: お前はどうした 返事はいらない
subtitles.english: What about you? I don't need an answer

subtitles.original: みんな行くよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's go!

subtitles.original: 破滅の純情\n作詞：西直紀 / 作曲：コモリタミノル
subtitles.english: Pure Heart of Destruction\nLyrics: Naoki Nishi / Composition: Minoru Komorita

subtitles.original: 燃え上がるガレキの上に立っている
subtitles.english: Standing atop the burning rubble

subtitles.original: いつからか 何故なのか 忘れたけど
subtitles.english: I've forgotten since when or why

subtitles.original: 息継ぎもできない 炎の中では
subtitles.english: Inside the flames where I can't even catch my breath

subtitles.original: 探しても 見つけても 意味がないよ
subtitles.english: There's no point in searching or finding

subtitles.original: 壊せ 超えろ 過去のエクスタシー
subtitles.english: Destroy and transcend the ecstasy of the past

subtitles.original: たとえ最悪でも 未来を選べ
subtitles.english: Even if it's the worst, choose the future

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: ギリギリまで Love Forever
subtitles.english: Until the very limit, Love Forever

subtitles.original: 悶えるほど 歌えば
subtitles.english: If you sing until you writhe

subtitles.original: 魂は どろまみれ
subtitles.english: Your soul will be covered in mud

subtitles.original: それでもまだ 叫べば
subtitles.english: If you still keep on screaming

subtitles.original: 生きることに 滾れば
subtitles.english: If you seethe with the will to live

subtitles.original: その先は 破滅の純情
subtitles.english: Beyond that is the pure heart of destruction

subtitles.original: 生き抜ける狂気を胸に走ってる
subtitles.english: Running with the madness to survive in my heart

subtitles.original: いつまでか 何故なのか 知らないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know until when or why

subtitles.original: 瞬きもできない 速度の中では
subtitles.english: Inside the speed where I can't even blink

subtitles.original: 喚いても 嘆いても 虚しいだけ
subtitles.english: It's just empty, no matter how much you cry out or grieve

subtitles.original: 唸れ 弾け ヒトのエモーション
subtitles.english: Roar and burst, human emotion

subtitles.original: たとえ最低でも 自分を選べ
subtitles.english: Even if it's the lowest, choose yourself

subtitles.original: 飛ぶよ！
subtitles.english: We're flying!

subtitles.original: ズタズタまで Love Forever
subtitles.english: Until you're in tatters, Love Forever

subtitles.original: 震えるほど 踊れば
subtitles.english: If you dance until you tremble

subtitles.original: 魂は むつぶれだし
subtitles.english: Your soul begins to crumble

subtitles.original: それでもまだ 動けば
subtitles.english: If you still keep on moving

subtitles.original: 光る空に 届けば
subtitles.english: If you reach the shining sky

subtitles.original: その先は 破滅の純情
subtitles.english: Beyond that is the pure heart of destruction

subtitles.original: 純情
subtitles.english: Pure heart
